ben-the-muster.name: Ben “the Muster”
ben-the-muster.description: Captain of a small, fast sloop with a ~40-person crew; a charismatic recruiter and feared organizer.
ben-the-muster.history: Has a rising bounty and is being actively sought (a Navy lieutenant asked after his current berth at Sablemarket Cay).

joryn-gullknife-sable.name: Captain Joryn “Gullknife” Sable
joryn-gullknife-sable.description: A rival captain and duelist from the Blackwake Circle who watches for chances to counter or undercut Ben.
joryn-gullknife-sable.history: Present at the Sablemarket Cay rumor-auction, smiling from the front row as bidding begins on the Sunken Crown chart.

lysa-quell.name: Factor Lysa Quell
lysa-quell.description: Eastwater Company factor known as a "smiling knife," offering work that creates dependence.
lysa-quell.history: Through a courier at Sablemarket Cay, offers to “buy your next week—exclusive.”
